text:
Incuiries From Commercial Stations
Cuite a number of incuiries have been received from
commercial stations about the possibility of their using some
of the NAEB programs as public service fare. One foundation in
Texas went so far as to offer a grant to the NAEB if some programs
were made available to them to offer on local commercial stations*
The standard reply to these inquiries has been that such
a procedure is not possible under the existing plan. This matter
must be decided by the board of NAEB0 We have maintained a file of
these incuiries and the stations have been told that we would
notify them of any change in this policy.
